headline: LyondellBasell Cash Gains And European Exits Reframe Risk Reward Profile
summary: LyondellBasell Industries (NYSE:LYB) exceeded its cash conservation targets, according to its latest update. The company is accelerating portfolio changes by fast tracking the divestment of four European assets. Management raised its cash improvement plan target while keeping its overall strategy intact during ongoing sector headwinds. LyondellBasell, a major global player in chemicals and plastics, is operating through a period in which many producers face pressure from energy costs,...

headline: 5 'Safer' Dividend Buys In Barron's 23 Better January Bets Than T-Bill
summary: VZ, MO, PFE, KEY, and RF offer 4.2%+ yields as growing payouts rival Treasury bonds across banks and REITs. Learn why these stocks offer safe income in 2026.
